title: Ancient treasures unveiled: The Royal Palace of Pella opens to the public with stunning Hellenistic statues
description: In a landmark cultural event, the archaeological site of the ancient palace of Pella—birthplace and childhood home of Alexander the Great—has officially opened its gates to the publicThe post Ancient treasures unveiled: The Royal Palace of Pella opens to the public with stunning Hellenistic statues appeared first on ProtoThema English.

title: Two cruise ships crash with 'extremely violent' impact on the Nile killing tourist during voyage to see Egypt's ancient treasures
description: A 47-year-old Italian, named Denise Ruggeri, was left crushed in her cabin during the deadly collision, which took place near Luxor at around 7pm on Sunday.

title: Pictures as displays of ancient Manx Christmas tradition raise hundreds for charity
description: Let’s hear it for the White Boys!

title: Nalanda Literature Festival | How Nalanda evolved from ancient manuscripts to modern conversations
description: Nalanda Literature Festival 2025 at Rajgir Convention Centre revives Nalanda’s legacy as a global learning hub, blending ancient scholarship with modern literary and cultural exchange.

title: From ancient spice to holiday staple: Gingerbread's journey through the centuries
description: From ancient ceremonial breads to medieval markets and Christmas traditions, gingerbread’s history explains why the spiced treat remains a holiday staple.
